block.p: Sarah Charles Gilbert, a daughter of Mike and Peter Gilbert of Carbondale, Colo., was married on Friday to Shane L'Estrange Tilston, the son of Jennifer Tilston of Brevard, N.C. Marie R. Lennon, the Brooklyn deputy city clerk, officiated at the Municipal Building there.

Mrs. Tilston, 28, is the special education teacher and coordinator at the Community Roots Charter School in Brooklyn. She graduated cum laude from Wellesley and received a master's degree in childhood special education from Bank Street College.
The couple were married on Friday at the Municipal Building in Brooklyn.

Sarah Charles Gilbert, a daughter of Mike and Peter Gilbert of Carbondale, Colo., was married on Friday to Shane L'Estrange Tilston, the son of Jennifer Tilston of Brevard, N.C. Marie R. Lennon, the Brooklyn deputy city clerk, officiated at the Municipal Building there.

Mrs. Tilston, 28, is the special education teacher and coordinator at the Community Roots Charter School in Brooklyn. She graduated cum laude from Wellesley and received a master's degree in childhood special education from Bank Street College.

Her father is an owner of Gilbert Manufacturing, an electrical device importer in Ipswich, Mass., and was until 1999 the president of the company, then a manufacturer in Long Island City, Queens. Her mother retired as an executive vice president and general manager of the North American subsidiary of Descente, a Japanese sportswear company.

Mr. Tilston, 33, is a founder of Hush/Roar Productions, a film production company in Manhattan. He is also a video producer at iThentic in Manhattan, which produces programming for mobile devices. He graduated from Tufts and received a Master of Fine Arts in theater from Sarah Lawrence.
His mother is a holistic practitioner.
